revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Hawking |model=HWR54G |revision=R |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/09/2005 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model=WR254 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MQ4WR254 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160BBTC-90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-7 |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model=RTL8225 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8305SC |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=hawking |default_ssid_regex=^hawking$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:12:0E |oui_eth=00:12:0E |default_ch= }} [http://hawkingtech.com/products/legacy_products/wireless_routers/repeaters/hwr54g.html?curr_tab=support Support page]
"G01-WR254-A10" is silkscreened on the production unit used to populate this entry. :The S/N of this unit is '''HABTWR54GR054103088'''. The tag line on the label reads ''Multi-function 802.11g Wireless Router''.
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=12630 Mention on the DD-WRT forums] :''<small>Oh, and for those interested, it was the Hawking HWR54G, which appears to be exactly the same on the inside as the Aztech WL730RT4.</small>'' ::A quick perusal for '''Aztech''' WL730RT4 board images yields a hit on the [http://sourceforge.net/projects/rtl8186/ rtl8186 firmware project on SourceForge] :::The board is silkscreened with "M01-WR254-E10", indicating that the device is some variant of the [[AboCom WR254]]
[http://web.archive.org/web/20070320054039/http://www.hawkingtech.com/support/details.php?CatID=19&FamID=13&ProdID=303 FCC ID viewable via Hawking's support site (via archive.org)] which indeed confirms the unit as a [[AboCom WR254]] :and also provides a sample OUI of 00:12:0E ('''AboCom''') :'''Revision R will have''' a serial number starting with the following characters: HABTWR54GR...
